scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Grundy family series, 1859-2012, undated, comprises genealogical research papers and some original legal and financial records belonging to the descendants of George and Elizabeth Grundy in Washington County, Kentucky. Legal documents include land deeds, wills, insurance claims, and court records from a family lawsuit against Louisville and Nashville Railroad. Financial records include coal shores, account books, and invoices. The series also contains genealogical notes and copies of papers and clippings about Grundy family members.
